feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.5
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds limit to docker containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3766 (f363b)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Use light mode bg color as theme color  -  by @agneevX in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3757 (2a2f6)
  • Fixes mobile menu having the wrong padding  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3765 (9c2e0)
  • Update and improve it locale  -  by @andreatitolo in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3771 (f691a)
  • Fixes backdrop on fuzzy search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3776 (37751)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3759 (e4fab)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3763 (21773)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3773 (42edc)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.6
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes cpu limit being miscalculated  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3782 (ddff2)
  • Fixes broken cpu and memory limits on swarm mode. correctly implements limits with agents  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3785 (70c23)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3786 (b7799)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.7
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add support for both .yml and .yaml files and prioritize .yml for users file  -  by @PiyushDixit96 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3789 (2f841)
  • Improves generate with confirm to catch typos  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3794 (7455a)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update dependency daisyui to v5.0.18  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3793 (51695)
  • Update dependency vite to v6.2.6 [security]  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3792 (84101)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.8
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Use /tmp instead of ./ to ensure that user permissions can be mounted correctly.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3797 (b33ae)
  • Fixes collapse color visually hard to see on light theme  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3801 (d43de)
  • Fixes broken link on container title  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3803 (0fee1)
  • Reverts confirm password  -  by @amir20 (a33f7)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3798 (a052f)
  • docs: Updates typos in docs  -  by @amir20 (febdb)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.9
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Creates betters messaging for analytics mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3812 (061cd)
  • More improvements to analytic and gzips logs for better performance  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3814 (1cf17)
  • Adds better disabled colors and loader while fetching big logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3816 (ec792)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3807 (d0dbd)
  • Update module github.com/yuin/goldmark to v1.7.10  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3809 (cc980)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3811 (e8f79)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3813 (12fad)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3817 (440f9)
    View changes on GitHub
